Hubot-gitter2 » Index » HubotGitter2Adapter

Class: HubotGitter2Adapter

Defined in: src/HubotGitter2Adapter.coffee
Inherits: Adapter

Overview

The hubot adapter for gitter

Property Summary

(RegExp) ROOM_ID_REGEXP
The regexp used to find if the given string is a valid room id
(GitterClient) _client
Our client

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) send(envelope, strings...) Raw method for sending data back to the chat source.
  • # (void) emote(envelope, strings...) Raw method for sending emote data back to the chat source.
  • # (void) reply(envelope, strings...) Raw method for building a reply and sending it back to the chat source.
  • # (void) topic(envelope, strings...) Raw method for setting a topic on the chat source.
  • # (void) play(envelope, strings...) Raw method for playing a sound in the chat source.
  • # (void) run() Raw method for invoking the bot to run.
  • # (void) close() Raw method for shutting the bot down.
  • # (GitterClient) gitterClient() Get our core client, creating it if necessary
  • # (void) _resolveRoom(uriOrRoom, join, callback) Resolve a Gitter room by URI or object, joining it if it is not joined yet
  • # (void) _handleChatMessage(eventName, room, data) Handles a room message event
  • # (void) _log(level, message) Log a message (debug by default)
  • # (User) _hubotUser(user) Get the hubot user for the given GitterUser
  • # (void) _registerUser(user) Register a user in the robot's brain

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(robot)

An adapter is a specific interface to a chat source for robots.

Parameters:

  • robot ( Robot ) — A Robot instance.

Instance Method Details

# (void) send(envelope, strings...)

Raw method for sending data back to the chat source. Extend this.

Parameters:

  • envelope ( Object ) — A Object with message, room and user details.
  • strings ( Array<String> ) — One or more Strings for each message to send.

# (void) emote(envelope, strings...)

Raw method for sending emote data back to the chat source. Defaults as an alias for send

Parameters:

  • envelope ( Object ) — A Object with message, room and user details.
  • strings ( Array<String> ) — One or more Strings for each message to send.

# (void) reply(envelope, strings...)

Raw method for building a reply and sending it back to the chat source. Extend this.

Returns nothing.

Parameters:

  • envelope ( Object ) — A Object with message, room and user details.
  • strings ( Array<String> ) — One or more Strings for each reply to send.

# (void) topic(envelope, strings...)

Raw method for setting a topic on the chat source. Extend this.

Parameters:

  • envelope ( Object ) — A Object with message, room and user details.
  • strings ( Array<String> ) — One more more Strings to set as the topic.

# (void) play(envelope, strings...)

Raw method for playing a sound in the chat source. Extend this.

Parameters:

  • envelope ( Object ) — A Object with message, room and user details.
  • strings ( Array<String> ) — One or more strings for each play message to send.

# (void) run()

Raw method for invoking the bot to run. Extend this.

# (void) close()

Raw method for shutting the bot down. Extend this.

# (GitterClient) gitterClient()

Get our core client, creating it if necessary

Returns:

  • ( GitterClient ) — The core client

# (void) _resolveRoom(uriOrRoom, join, callback)

Resolve a Gitter room by URI or object, joining it if it is not joined yet

Parameters:

  • uriOrRoom ( String, Object ) — The room description, or its URI, or its ID
  • join ( Boolean ) — Defines whether to join or not the room. Default: false
  • callback ( Function ) — The method to call when the room is found

# (void) _handleChatMessage(eventName, room, data)

Handles a room message event

Parameters:

  • room ( GitterRoom ) — The room where the event triggered
  • event ( Object ) — The event object, with operation and model, last one being the message itself

# (void) _log(level, message)

Log a message (debug by default)

Parameters:

  • level ( String ) — The level, default to debug
  • message ( String ) — The message to log

# (User) _hubotUser(user)

Get the hubot user for the given GitterUser

Parameters:

  • user ( GitterUser ) — The core GitterUser

Returns:

  • ( User ) — The hubot user object

# (void) _registerUser(user)

Register a user in the robot's brain

Parameters:

  • user ( GitterUser ) — The user to register
